thread.title: DianhuaChina.com Announces Lower Rates for International Calls to China
thread.title_full: DianhuaChina.com Announces Lower Rates for International Calls to China - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: DianhuaChina.com Announces Lower Rates for International Calls to China
text:
DianhuaChina.com announces lower rates for international calls to any number in China. The amazing new rates are now as low as 0.6¢/min.
Atlanta, Georgia (PRWEB) September 26, 2015
DianhuaChina.com has great news for everyone making calls to China! The international calling website now offers more affordable rates for Voice Credit calls to mobiles and landlines in this country as well as for Monthly Plans. With DianhuaChina.com, calls to China are now as low as 0.6¢/min.
Voice Credit rates have never been lower. Calling any number in China used to cost 1¢/min, but this price now dropped to 0.9¢/min. The rate for sending an SMS stays the same: 14¢.
As far as Monthly Plans are concerned, things get even better. Chine 550, offering 550 minutes to both landlines and mobiles in China, used to cost $4.99/month, but it is now only $3.88/month. For China 1100, offering 1100 minutes to any number in China, customers used to pay $8.98/month, but this plan now costs only $6.88/month and ensures users benefit from the best rate to call China: a whopping 0.6¢/min.
DianhuaChina.com offers a wide variety of calling options, to suit every need. Customers can call from:
any phone, through the use of local or toll free access numbers; any computer, through the Web Call application; any smartphone, as DianhuaChina.com offers a free app, for both iOS and Android devices, called KeepCalling.
Beside Voice Credit and Monthly Plans, DianhuaChina.com also offers Mobile Recharge, a service through which customers can recharge mobile phones anywhere in the world. The process is fast and secure and the credit reaches its destination instantly. The mobile operators available for recharges to China are China Mobile, China Unicom, and China Telecom.
DianhuaChina.com runs a policy focused on integrating superior customer service, while maintaining the highest quality standards at affordable rates. That is why DianhuaChina.com is the best solution for international calls.
What makes the service even more reliable are the 100% transaction security, the 24/7 Customer Service available by phone, chat, and email in both English and Spanish, and the comprehensive Help Center.
On review websites, customers point out the low rates and high quality offered by DianhuaChina.com. One of them says ‘The best I have used. It has very good price and it's convenient to use, you have several options. The quality is quite good, it's worthy of five stars.’
About DianhuaChina.com :
DianhuaChina.com is an interactive website designed by KeepCalling, a global telecommunications company registered in 2002 in USA. Presently, KeepCalling provides its services to hundreds of thousands of consumers and businesses, with a focus on customer satisfaction. KeepCalling has been listed by Inc 5000 as one of the fastest growing companies in the USA for 5 consecutive years. In 2015 the company registered a revenue increase of over 200% from 2011 to 2014.
 //www.prweb.com/releases/2015/09/prweb12982152.htm
